name: Hard As Balls
description:
Hard as Balls is a party game for up to 4 players.

Swing your spikeball into your opponents but be careful, your spikeball is just as deadly to you as it is to them!

Note on Scoring: Players receive 2 points for killing another player, and lose 1 point for suicide.

Controls:

Keyboard:

Player 1

  • A, D: Move Left and Right
  • Space: Jump
  • Q: Pull Spikeball 

Player 2

  • Left, Right Arrows: Move Left and Right
  • Up Arrow: Jump
  • CTRL: Pull Spikeball

Controller (All Players... Note 4 controllers required for 4 players as Controller 1 and 2 are hard coded to player 1 and 2)

  • Left Stick: Move Left and Right
  • A: Jump
  • X: Pull Spikeball

Game is Local multiplayer only, but works great with PARSEC!
